title: Dimethylphosphite Electrosynthesis from Inorganic Phosphorus Building Blocks via Oxidative Coupling

Junnan Li, Hossein Bemana, Nikolay Kornienko
Organophosphorus compounds carry importance in the chemical, medical, and fertilizer industries. Their production often entails the use of white phosphorus or PCl3, which are toxic and energetically costly to produce....
